name: Ten Steps of Life (LD)
description:
Avoid anything that could kill you.

**Astonishingly incomplete LD version** (for ratings). Please check the post-jam version here.

Made for Ludum Dare #50 (Theme: Delay the inevitable)

"Show me, Lord, my life’s end
    and the number of my days;
    let me know how fleeting my life is."
